title: Amazfit Active Edge Smart Watch 46 mm, Rugged Fitness Watch, GPS, AI Health Coach, 16-Day Battery, 130+ Sports Modes, Activity Trackers and Smartwatches Android and iPhone Compatible, Lava Black
description: This rugged fitness watch caters to diverse needs, whether you're engaging in outdoor sports or navigating city life. Stay connected and motivated with the comprehensive fitness tracker capabilities, including monitoring steps, distance, calories, and syncing data through platforms like Apple Health, Adidas Running, and more. Built robustly, these military smart watches for men and women boast 10 ATM water resistance, making them ideal for swimming, hiking, cycling, and gym workouts. The enhanced Generation 2 strap provides durability, pairing aesthetics with practicality. Enjoy accuracy with the integrated GPS and support from five satellite navigation systems, allowing for precise tracking of your outdoor adventures. The smart watch for iPhone compatible and Android compatible is here to help you find your edge. These smart watches for women and men are equipped with a long-lasting battery, supporting up to 24 days in power-saving mode or 16 days with typical use, delivering uninterrupted performance. Tailor your fitness regime with personalized AI coaching, crafted to elevate your activity & fitness trackers experience. Available in a contemporary design, the Amazfit Active Edge watch is perfect for those who demand style and substance from their activity trackers and smartwatches.
